content: knits by evelyn young sweet and simple hat this hat is very sweet on a little one s head and so simple to knit it has a subtle hint of texture it can be made with one or more colors the stripes provide an opportunity to make use of small amounts of yarn left over from other projects the simple texture stitch pattern can be found in vogue knitting the ultimate knitting book sizes newborn 1-6 months 6-12 months gauge supplies 5 stitches per inch with us7 needles and a stockinette swatch caron simply soft 100% acrylic or abbreviations berroco comfort 50% k knit acrylic 50% nylon or k1-tbl knit 1 through the back loop other worsted weight ssk slip 2 stitches to the right needle insert left needle into front yarn of the 2 stitches knit them together through the back loop us 7 16 circular p purl needles ac alternate color us 7 double pointed mc main color needles tapestry needle stitch marker 1 instructions for hat in one color 1 cast on 56 64 72 stitches using the long-tail method join in the round being careful not to twist and adding a stitch marker 2 knit 5 6 6 rounds of ribbing 3 knit 3 setup rounds 4 knit the simple texture stitch pattern one color as follows  newborn knit stitch pattern 2 times then knit round 1  1-6 months knit stitch pattern 2 times then knit rounds 1-5  6-12 months knit stitch pattern 3 times then knit round 1 5 continue to knit rounds if needed until hat measures 4 ½ 5 5 ½ from cast on edge 6 knit the crown decrease 7 cut the yarn and thread through loops bury the ends of yarn at the cast on edge and crown instructions for striped hat 1 with mc yarn cast on 56 64 72 stitches using the long-tail method join in the round being careful not to twist and adding a stitch marker 2 knit 5 6 6 rounds of ribbing with mc yarn 3 knit 3 setup rounds rounds 1 and 2 are knit with mc yarn round 3 is knit with ac yarn 4 knit the simple texture stitch pattern with stripes as follows  newborn knit stitch pattern 2 times then knit round 1  1-6 months knit stitch pattern 2 times then knit rounds 1-5  6-12 months knit stitch pattern 3 times then knit round 1 5 continue to knit rounds if needed with mc yarn until hat measures 4 ½ 5 5 ½ from cast on edge 6 knit the crown decrease with mc yarn 7 cut the yarn and thread through loops bury all ends of yarn ribbing *k1-tbl p1 repeat from * to end simple texture stitch pattern one
